user.title: ICS
user.description:
Enter the sensor name and configure sensor parameters. More info on https://github.com/koljawindeler/ics#configuration-options.
 Page 1/2

data.name: Friendly name (can be changed later on) and title for the config flow (fix)
data.url: The url to the ics file. Usually http://domain/calendar.ics but can also be local file:///tmp/test.ics
data.id: Unique number to identify your sensor later on. e.g. id=1 results in sensor.ical_1
data.startswith: Filter, see link above for more info
